name: In re Living Trust Agreement of Lillian M. STEINKIRCHNER. Appeal of Marcella R. McNANAMY, Co-Trustee
name_abbreviation: In re Living Trust Agreement of Steinkirchner

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: In re Living Trust Agreement of Lillian M. STEINKIRCHNER. Appeal of Marcella R. McNANAMY, Co-Trustee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The Decree of the Court of Common Pleas of Allegheny County is affirmed. Each party is to pay own costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Frederick N. Frank, Baskin & Sears, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Robert B. Williams, John R. Mesher, Margaret P. Joy Eckert, Seamans, Cherin & Mellott, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
421 A.2d 208
In re Living Trust Agreement of Lillian M. STEINKIRCHNER. Appeal of Marcella R. McNANAMY, Co-Trustee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 30, 1980.
Decided Nov. 3, 1980.
Frederick N. Frank, Baskin & Sears, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Robert B. Williams, John R. Mesher, Margaret P. Joy Eckert, Seamans, Cherin & Mellott, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
